text: On April 10, 2017, a shooting occurred inside a special education classroom at North Park Elementary School in San Bernardino, California. The shooting was an apparent murder-suicide and an act of domestic violence. Three people—the gunman; his wife, who taught at the school; and a student standing behind her—died from their wounds. Another student was wounded and hospitalized. == References == Category:2017 murders in the United States Category:Elementary school shootings in the United States Category:Murder-suicides in California
title: North Park Elementary School shooting
